name: android-soundboard-app
description: Android Soundboard Application with Computer Connectivity

scripts.build: npm run setup && npm run build:android
scripts.build:android: node -e "const os=require('os'); const {execSync}=require('child_process'); const wrapper = os.platform()==='win32'?'gradlew.bat':'./gradlew'; execSync(`${wrapper} clean assembleDebug`, {stdio:'inherit'});"
scripts.clean: node -e "const os=require('os'); const {execSync}=require('child_process'); const wrapper = os.platform()==='win32'?'gradlew.bat':'./gradlew'; execSync(`${wrapper} clean`, {stdio:'inherit'});"
